name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - Director's Cut
description: Just for those who own it indepently from Steam or Gog
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  appid: 238010
installer:
- task:
    key: EnableDirectX11
    name: set_regedit
    path: 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Eidos\Deus Ex: HRDC\Graphics'
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: lutris-5.2-x86_64
